description: Contributed 60,000 lines of code for 2 client projects from scratch using Java, Spring Boot, and MongoDB.
Improved API performance by 40% with optimized MongoDB queries and aggregation pipelines.
Consistently delivered functional software on schedule, adhering to project deadlines.
Thoroughly debugged and resolved software issues, significantly enhancing product quality and reliability.
Developed a web application for the Alumni Cell at Maharaja Surajmal Institute, showcasing events, teams, and galleries.
Engineered a responsive and modern user interface using React.js and Tailwind CSS, enhancing user experience.
Developed a web portfolio for Melius - Consulting and Analytics Club, Delhi, to showcase their teams, events, and projects.
Designed and implemented a seamless user interface using React.js and Tailwind CSS, enhancing the client-side experience.
